dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT a.carrier_id, a.carrier_name, a.rate_off_id, a.rate_rec_id, a.insert_date, b.last_used_date, b.ship_count FROM (SELECT DISTINCT loc.location_xid carrier_id, loc.location_name carrier_name, ro.rate_offering_xid rate_off_id, rg.rate_geo_gid, TO_CHAR(rg.insert_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') insert_date, rg.rate_geo_xid rate_rec_id FROM rate_geo rg INNER JOIN rate_offering ro ON rg.rate_offering_gid = ro.rate_offering_gid INNER JOIN location loc ON ro.servprov_gid = loc.location_gid WHERE rg.is_active = 'Y' AND rg.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/FOOD' AND (rg.expiration_date IS NULL OR TRUNC(rg.expiration_date) > TRUNC(SYSDATE)) AND ro.is_active = 'Y' AND ro.servprov_gid NOT IN ('SCOULAR.FOBCARR','SCOULAR.SPOT BID CARRIER') AND rg.rate_geo_gid NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT s.rate_geo_gid FROM shipment s WHERE s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/FOOD' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.rate_geo_gid IS NOT NULL AND TRUNC(s.start_time) >= TRUNC(SYSDATE - 180))) a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT rg.rate_geo_gid, TO_CHAR(MAX(TRUNC(s.start_time)),'MM/DD/YYYY') last_used_date, COUNT(s.shipment_gid) ship_count FROM shipment s INNER JOIN rate_geo rg ON s.rate_geo_gid = rg.rate_geo_gid AND s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/FOOD' AND s.servprov_gid NOT IN ('SCOULAR.FOBCARR','SCOULAR.SPOT BID CARRIER') AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' GROUP BY rg.rate_geo_gid) b ON a.rate_geo_gid = b.rate_geo_gid ORDER BY 1,2,3
